speaker: Jingya Huang
title: Easier, Faster Training for your Hugging Face models
description:
Jingya Huang joins Cassie Breviu to talk about how to use Optimum + ONNX Runtime to accelerate the training of Hugging Face models. In the demo, we will fine-tune the DeBERTa model with Trainer and show the gain by leveraging the ONNX Runtime backend.

Chapters:
00:00 Welcome to the AI Show
00:27 Welcome Jingya
01:14 What is Optimum
02:02 Optimum Library
03:11 Accelerate Training with ORTTrainer
06:54 Demo
17:14 Learn more
19:02 Wrap
